name: Zombus - Nokia3310 JAM 2
description:
This is my contribution for Nokia3310 JAM 2. The theme for this jam is “Death is Good” so I decided to create my game “Zombus” (Why ? Because it is the merge between Zombie and Virus... yeah I am not very inspired to find a name x’)). I don’t use engine to develop, only a framework named Love2d with Lua for programming language.

In Zombus, you play a zombie and your goal is to kill all citizens to extend your horde and become THE world master . But to be a zombie is not easy, police will try to kill you with theirs guns and scientists won't hesitate to hunt you for theirs experiences.  Be careful, if yours points of attack is lower (or equal) than points of enemies you can have big troubles. Every time you kill someone you increase yours points of attack and you can kill stronger enemies, so play strategically. To leak is not a shame… :D

I make all assets in the game except sounds which come from jam organizers.

Controls:

Keypad keys 4,8,5 and 6 : to move (respectively left, up, down and right)

There can have some bugs, I couldn’t fix everything in time but have fun and don’t hesitate to leave comment !

To leave a comments logs in with itch.io
